      • addProcess

        public static final void addProcess(java.lang.Class<? extends ITProcess> classe)
                             throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                    java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Creates an instance of the process class and add it in the pool.
 
 Will be started from scheduler if the process is scheduled 
 or will be started if the process is to be auto start.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
